heading: Some music has a pulse you cannot fake.
paragraphs: Before mixing records, Daniel spent years on the other side of music. Digging through vinyl as a DJ in the Bay Area. Learning piano and falling into jazz. Growing up on hip hop, soul, R&B, and reggae.
Not studying theory â€” studying why songs move people. That instinct still guides every mix. He doesn't change songs. He makes what's already great shine.
